ValidationRule.description: Must enter today's date in Reviewed Plan Details field. Once a date has been entered, it cannot be changed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration",ISCHANGED(Reviewed_Plan_Details__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Reviewed_Plan_Details__c))), true, IF(NOT(Reviewed_Plan_Details__c = TODAY()), true, false) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter today's date in Reviewed Plan Details field. Once a date has been entered, it cannot be changed.
